pages.text: A sinister $(l:miskatonicmysteries:rites/triggered_rites)$(marked)triggered Rite$() used as protection or trap. By creating a modified form of a Warp Point held under tension, one can allow creatures from the Otherwhere to enter the realm once a soul passes near, or if the rite is forcefully activated.
The Rite must be performed $(l)only on the other Octagram.$()
